categoryDescriptions.fun: Fun commands, they have no real purpose other than to entertain. Enjoy :)
categoryDescriptions.moderation: These commands are specifically for disciplining members or providing corrective action.
categoryDescriptions.macro: Macro commands are useful for maintaining and displaying helpful messages.
categoryDescriptions.utility: Generally useful commands, this is a misc section.
categoryDescriptions.infractions: Used for distributing and maintaining strike-based infractions.
categoryDescriptions.permissions: Administrative functionality for setting command permissions.
categoryDescriptions.suggestions: You can use commands in this section to give suggestions to the server.
categoryDescriptions.embed: Commands used to build an embed and then send it. You build an embed by using the set/add commands (listed below) - when ready, use sendembed

commands.name: cat
commands.description: Displays a picture of a cat.

commands.name: flip
commands.description: Flips a coin.

commands.name: addmacro
commands.description: Adds a macro by the which will respond with the given message when invoked by the given name.

commands.name: removemacro
commands.description: Removes a macro with the given name

commands.name: listmacros
commands.description: List all of the currently available macros.

commands.name: nuke
commands.description: Delete the last 1 - 99 messages in the chat.

commands.name: move
commands.description: Move every message found within the given search space sent by any supplied ID in the Comma separated ID list to the specified channel.
commands.structure: {idList (a list of ids, separated by commas)} {searchSpace} {targetChannelID}

commands.name: ignore
commands.description: Drop all commands from the given id (user or channel)

commands.name: mute
commands.description: Mute a member for a specified amount of minutes.

commands.name: lockdown
commands.description: Force the bot to ignore anyone who isn't the owner.

commands.name: prefix
commands.description: Set the bot prefix to the specified string (Cannot be a space)

commands.name: setFilter
commands.description: Set the permission level required to run a command which contains a mention (used for mention sanitation)

commands.name: setperm
commands.description: Set the permission level of the given command to the given permission level.

commands.name: getPerm
commands.description: Get the current required permission level for a particular command.

commands.name: listcommands
commands.description: List all commands

commands.name: listavailable
commands.description: List what commands are available to you.

commands.name: listPerms
commands.description: List all available permission levels.

commands.name: listCommandPerms
commands.description: Display all current commands and the corresponding required permission level to use each of them.

commands.name: warn
commands.description: Warn a member, giving them a 0 strike infraction with the given reason.

commands.name: strike
commands.description: Give a member a weighted infraction, with specified weight and reason. This may result in them being banned. Weights should be below or equal to StrikeCeil
commands.example: 1324234523048 1 Refusing to stop arguing. Please pay more attention to what moderators are saying to you

commands.name: history
commands.description: Display a user's infraction history.

commands.name: removeStrike
commands.description: Delete a particular strike by ID (these are listed in the history command).

commands.name: cleanse
commands.description: Completely wipe a user of all infractions. (Permanently deletes them)

commands.name: ping
commands.description: Pong!

commands.name: help
commands.description: Display a help menu.

commands.name: serverinfo
commands.description: Display a message giving basic server information

commands.name: exit
commands.description: Exit, saving configurations.

commands.name: kill
commands.description: Exit, without saving configurations.

commands.name: uptime
commands.description: Displays how long you have kept me, HOTBOT, AWAKE!

commands.name: info
commands.description: Display some information about me

commands.name: dog
commands.description: Display a picture of a dog

commands.name: suggest
commands.description: Send a suggestion to the pre-lim pool. Suggestions are reviewed by a mod before they are reviewed by the community.
commands.example: I want a rust channel because I want a rust channel. **Notice me senpai**

commands.name: poolinfo
commands.description: Display how many suggestions are in the staging area.

commands.name: poolTop
commands.description: See the suggestion in the pool next in line for review.

commands.name: poolaccept
commands.description: Move the suggestion at the top of the pool to the community review stage.

commands.name: pooldeny
commands.description: Delete the suggestion at the top of the pool; this is for removing bad or vulgar suggestions.

commands.name: respond
commands.description: Respond to a suggestion in the community review stage. Suggestions here can be accepted or denied, must supply a reason.
commands.example: 1231928401824 Denied This is a bad suggestion, it won't really fit here, sadly.

commands.name: badname
commands.description: Auto-nick a user with a bad name.

commands.name: clearEmbed
commands.description: Reset the embed in memory

commands.name: sendEmbed
commands.description: Send the embed in the channel. This will not call clearEmbed.

commands.name: setTitle
commands.description: Set the title of the embed in memory

commands.name: setDescription
commands.description: Set the description of the embed

commands.name: clearEmbed
commands.description: Reset the embed in memory

commands.name: addTimestamp
commands.description: Add a timestamp to the footer of the embed in memory

commands.name: setColour
commands.description: Set the colour of the embed using RGB -- values must be between 0 and 1

commands.name: setSelfAuthor
commands.description: Set yourself to be the author of the embed

commands.name: setAuthor
commands.description: Set a user with the given ID to be the author

commands.name: setImage
commands.description: Set the image of the embed

commands.name: setFooter
commands.description: Set the footer of the embed, including the URL and text

commands.name: addBlankField
commands.description: Add a blank field to the embed

commands.name: addField
commands.description: Add the field currently held in memory to the embed currently held in memory (Note: Use setFName and setFText to set the text)

commands.name: addIField
commands.description: Inline and add the field currently held in memory to the embed currently held in memory (Note: Use setFName and setFText to set the text)

commands.name: clearFieldHolder
commands.description: Clear the fields out in the field in memory, resetting the field to a new one

commands.name: setFText
commands.description: Set the field text in memory
commands.example: this text will be appended to the bottom of the field... :)

commands.name: setFName
commands.description: Set the field name or title
commands.example: This text will be set as the title of the field... :)

commands.name: setThumbnail
commands.description: Set the thumbnail of the embed
